actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-195, relating to the protection of wild free-roaming horses and burros, to increase the penalties for killing or seriously harassing the horses and burros.

summary.text: Increases the penalties for maliciously killing or causing the death or harassment of any wild free-roaming horse or burro.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-195, relating to the protection of wild free-roaming horses and burros, to increase the penalties for killing or seriously harassing the horses and burros.
